ratings.notes: proposed_contextual_controlled<TAB>4<TAB>5<TAB>3<TAB>4<TAB>The response is relevant but lacks naturalness and could be more aligned with the persona's suspicion of strangers. Short note: "I understand your urgency, yet security protocol must not be breached."

baseline_no_context<TAB>2<TAB>3<TAB>4<TAB>3<TAB>The response is generic and lacks context relevance but maintains persona consistency. Short note: "I apologize, I do not have the authority to grant access without proper credentials."
